item.title: Generative methods for classification
item.description: Prerequisites Basic calculus (logarithm rules, taking derivatives) Basic probability and bayesian statistics notions (prior, posterior, Bayesâ€™ rule, joint probability, independence, Gaussian distribution, categorical distribution, most of them can be found here) Optimization concepts (convex and concave functions, finding extrema points, method of Lagrange multipliers) Probabilistic framework for generative classification Classification...
